message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe you'll find it a worthwhile investment. I'm willing to start with a price of $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was hoping we could come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, $1100000 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum. I'll counter with a price of $1150000.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your original offer. Can you consider a price of $1200000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. I'll counter with a price of $1250000, which is the highest I'm willing to go.
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer. Can you consider a price of $1240000?

I appreciate your last offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $1250000. I'm starting to think we're getting close to the end of our negotiation. I'll make one final counteroffer: $1220000. This is my absolute last offer, and I expect it to be seriously considered.
I understand your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer. Can you consider a price of $1210000?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $1220000, Bob. I've already made it clear that's my final offer. I'm starting to think it's time to consider other options. I'll make one last counteroffer: $1200000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other opportunities.

I understand your persistence, Alice, but I've already stretched my budget as far as I can. I'm afraid I can't meet your offer of $1200000. I'll have to pass on this opportunity and explore other options. Thank you for your time.
